captions.text:
I've brought you here to deal with a menace
thats been plaguing me for generations of consoles.

My people have crawled out of the sewers only
to be literally stomped on by this red menace.

My attempts to strike a peace core with the
Princess have been... fruitless.

We tried killing him but he seems to have
unlimited one-ups.
We need to change our approach.
There.. That look ok to you?
Alright, let's get outta here before he comes...
Could I interest you in some delicious cake?
No, stop. Thats not how you use that.

title: How Super Mario Should Have Ended
